activities: We provide a 'refer a friend' service to other companies, giving them the tools to allow their customers to share discounts on products in return for commissions on sales.  A vendor in the EU must transmit to us basic customer information (name/e-mail address) of the buyer so that we can register the buyer in our system and allow the buyer (a consumer) to share coupons.  We do not trade, sell or share any consumers private information with any other company or consumer.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
